comment.body:
> [zaphod](#comment_1_1JA2umSc9f7VSNLaYLs1Cpk7rpvS4p18xe): Really nice, like the idea.And the first ones are linked already, keep it up!I will share this, we need more of this good stuff.

I'll link more by request. It would take forever to go through and do them all in order.

> [zaphod](#comment_2_1JA2umSc9f7VSNLaYLs1Cpk7rpvS4p18xe): Of course, do you prefer requests via zeromail, or right here in the comments?

You can use comments if you want, but for the safety of the person requesting I'd prefer if you/they used a secure contact method like one of the ones listed on my contact page (ZeroMail, BitMessage, Ricochet).

> [oracle](#comment_1_1ED3Ho3kmzaKiECtyuqSjDpoE47rKuXeP): I took you a screenshot of what I am looking at. https://ipfs.pics/QmXLfqa2v5bkT82oRAUAGiVGKuWyAYFdPvL1bKgoPqrNrR I have noticed one problem , when I write a comment the comment box stays black like the background and I can't see what I'm typing
OK thanks!
